<title level="1" right="Trait">[Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

You can use this weapon to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) with the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill even if you don't have a free hand. This uses the weapon's [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) (if different from your own) and adds the weapon's item bonus to attack rolls as an item bonus to the Athletics check. If you critically fail a check to Trip using the weapon, you can drop the weapon to take the effects of a failure instead of a critical failure.
